ca.ualberta.cs.corgFuControllers

Class AllQuestionsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.corgFuControllers.AllQuestionsController

  • public class AllQuestionsController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class that updates and modifies the AllQuestions model that holds all the currently available questions.
    Author:
    wrflemin
    See Also:
    AllQuestions

      • sortByDate

        public java.util.ArrayList<Question> sortByDate()
        Sorts all of the questions in the AllQuestions model by their creation date.
        Returns:
        An Array of the questions held by the AllQuestions model sorted by date (Freshest first)

      • sortByPicture

        public java.util.ArrayList<Question> sortByPicture()
        Sots all of the questions in the AllQuestions model by whether or not they have a picture.
        Returns:
        A sorted Array of the questions held by the AllQuestions model based on whether or not they have a question

      • sortByUpvote

        public java.util.ArrayList<Question> sortByUpvote()
        Sorts all of the questions in the AllQuestions model by their number of upvotes.
        Returns:
        An Array of the questions held by the AllQuestions model sorted by upvotes (Most first)

        Parameters:
        string - The keyword the user is using to search the questions and answers in elastic search (All questions by all users)
        Returns:

        public java.util.ArrayList<Question> getAllQuestions()
        Returns all of the questions that are currently available in the AllQuestions model
        Returns:

      • getQuestionById

        public Question getQuestionById(int id)
        Gets the question from the AllQuestions model that has the specified id
        Parameters:
        id - The psuodo random number given to a question to help identify it.
        Returns:
        The question that has the id matching the specified id. Null if no such matching question is found.
